address.streetAddress: 4, North London Business Park, Oakleigh Rd S

budget.description: Budget allocation for highway maintenance, aligned with 2015 strategic plan.

planning.rationale: The 2009 Strategic Plan identifies a need for an improved cycle route in the centre of town.

documents.title: Area Wide Cycle Improvements - Procurement Plan
documents.description: The overall strategic framework for procurement to enhance cycle provision.

documents.title: Cycle provision - Needs Assessment
documents.description: Needs assessment for provision for cyclists in the centre of town.

tender.title: Planned cycle lane improvements
tender.description: Tenders solicited for work to build new cycle lanes in the centre of town.
tender.procurementMethodRationale: An open competitive tender is required by EU Rules
tender.awardCriteriaDetails: The best proposal, subject to value for money requirements, will be accepted.

documents.title: Consultation on cycle provision
documents.description: A consultation document inviting citizen input into cycle provision.

documents.title: Map of affected areas
documents.description: A map showing areas affected by the planned highway updates. Available from local libraries.

documents.title: Enquiry Responses
documents.description: Responses to enquiries asked by interested parties.

milestones.title: Consultation Period
milestones.description: A consultation period is open for citizen input to shape the final plans.

tender.submissionMethodDetails: Submit through the online portal at http://example.com/submissions/ocds-213czf-000-00001-01/

amendments.description: Following the enquiry period, enquiries were received and responses to questions asked have been published. No changes to the overall tender details were made.

awards.title: Award of contract to build new cycle lanes in the centre of town.
awards.description: Balfour Beatty Plc has been awarded the contract to build new cycle lanes in the centre of town.

documents.title: Award notice
documents.description: Award of contract to build new cycle lanes in the centre of town to Balfour Beatty Plc.

contracts.title: Contract to build new cycle lanes in the centre of town.
contracts.description: A contract has been signed between the Council and Balfour Beatty Plc for construction of new cycle lanes in the centre of town.

documents.title: Signed Contract
documents.description: The Signed Contract for Cycle Path Construction
